publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5483 Bill Kidd: Construction of National Indoor Sports Arena and Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome and Sports Arenaâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the commencement of the construction of the National Indoor Sports Arena and Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome for the 2014 Commonwealth Games in Glasgow; notes that these facilities, when complete in 2012, will serve as a national training centre for athletics, basketball, netball, track cycling and volleyball; offers its congratulations to the Scottish Government, Glasgow City Council and all other partners involved in the organisation of the 2014 Commonwealth Games for getting underway with construction work; believes that these world-class facilities will put Glasgow on the map as a centre for sporting excellence while building a lasting legacy for the city, and looks forward to the most successful Commonwealth games ever.
S3M-5483 Construction of National Indoor Sports Arena and Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome and Sports Arena (lodged on 8 January 2010) Bob Doris*, Jackie Baillie*, Stuart McMillan*
